Sentencas: The physical properties and microstructures of supporting anodes are extremely important for the performances of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Investigation on the microstructures, mechanical and electrical properties of solid oxide fuel cells anodes fabricated by using chitosan and cold mounts powders as new pore formers

Sentencas: In the present work, for the first time, two new pore formers, cold mount powder and chitosan as well as graphite, activated carbon and corn starch as three well-known pore formers were studied and used for fabrication of porous Ni-YSZ anodes of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Investigation on the microstructures, mechanical and electrical properties of solid oxide fuel cells anodes fabricated by using chitosan and cold mounts powders as new pore formers

Sentencas: Morphological features and size of the pore former particles were characterized by using scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and particle size analyzer (PSA) technique and their thermal decomposition/oxidation properties were determined by thermo gravimetric analysis (TGA).
Titulo: Investigation on the microstructures, mechanical and electrical properties of solid oxide fuel cells anodes fabricated by using chitosan and cold mounts powders as new pore formers

Sentencas: The performances of the fabricated porous Ni-YSZ anodes were evaluated in terms of the resultant microstructure, mechanical strength, and electrical conductivity measurements.
Titulo: Investigation on the microstructures, mechanical and electrical properties of solid oxide fuel cells anodes fabricated by using chitosan and cold mounts powders as new pore formers

Sentencas: The strengths were measured by ball-on-ring method.
Titulo: Investigation on the microstructures, mechanical and electrical properties of solid oxide fuel cells anodes fabricated by using chitosan and cold mounts powders as new pore formers

Sentencas: Weibull statistics were used to describe the distribution of the measured strengths.
Titulo: Investigation on the microstructures, mechanical and electrical properties of solid oxide fuel cells anodes fabricated by using chitosan and cold mounts powders as new pore formers

Sentencas: The results indicated that the microstructure, mechanical strength, and electrical conductivity of the fabricated porous Ni-YSZ anodes depend directly on the type of pore former used.
Titulo: Investigation on the microstructures, mechanical and electrical properties of solid oxide fuel cells anodes fabricated by using chitosan and cold mounts powders as new pore formers

Sentencas: The results also showed that the cold mount powder and chitosan, by creating porosities with irregular shapes, produce anodes with lower fracture strength and modest electrical conductivity with respect to the other used pore formers.
Titulo: Investigation on the microstructures, mechanical and electrical properties of solid oxide fuel cells anodes fabricated by using chitosan and cold mounts powders as new pore formers
Investigation on the microstructures, mechanical and electrical properties of solid oxide fuel cells anodes fabricated by using chitosan and cold mounts powders as new pore formers
